comments:

recreate on demand. I'm running M5a on Win/XP Pro.

!SUBENTRY 1 org.eclipse.jdt.debug 4 130 2005-03-07 14:53:02.968
!MESSAGE Invalid stack frame

Actually, there's no harm here. The detail pane is updated asynchronously, and 
by the time the details are computed (when doing rapid stepping), it is 
possible that the frame is no longer valid. No need to log the error.

Fixed in VariablesView.
